role.argrole: touched with, if separate from agent

example.parse: (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM خلافات) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الزعماء) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الاقطاعيين)) (CONJ و) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN العائلات)))) (UCP (PP (PREP على) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يمس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مصالح) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الخاصة))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تحت) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ستار) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN شعارات) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN وطنية))))))))
